700548f-a.text:
Boston Road, north from Allerton Ave. On the east side of the thoroughfare is the extensive Lorillard Spencer Estate.
1917.

701437f-a.text:
Matthews Avenue, at the S.E. corner of Boston Road.
April 3, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
